translated: The Bodhi tree of that Fortunate One,
is said to have been the Asana.

was the Victorious One, the High One.
The life of that one of incomparable splendour
the one with vision remained in the world.

like a mass of fire that has blazed,
he was extinguished together with his disciples.

like a festival by the sun,
